title: Belle Starr's Daughter (1948 Western) Bandit Queen & Desperadoes Who Killed For Her! 4K

sources.title: Belle Starr's Daughter (1948 Western) Bandit Queen & Desperadoes Who Killed For Her! 4K
sources.description:
When fiery Cimarron Rose mistakenly blames Marshal Tom Jackson for her Mother Belle Starr's death, she joins forces with the cunning and ruthless Bob "Bitter Creek". As bullets fly and loyalties are tested, Tom must outwit the gang, clear his name, and win Rose's trust before the West's wild justice catches up to them all.

Original title: Belle Starr's Daughter

Director: Lesley Selander
Writers: W.R. Burnett 

Main cast:
George Montgomery - Marshal Tom Jackson
Rod Cameron - Bob "Bitter Creek" Yauntis
Ruth Roman - Cimarron Rose
Isabel Jewell - Belle Starr

Genres: Western
Release date: November 11, 1948 (Los Angeles)
Filming location: Iverson Ranch, Chatsworth, California


00:00 -  Full Movie available with English & Spanish audio, and subtitled in many language options
01:57 - Cimarron Rose vows vengeance after outlaw queen Belle Starr dies clutching a sheriff's badge
12:18 - Rose recruits ruthless Bob "Bitter Creek" Yauntis to hunt her mother's killers
24:37 - Marshal Tom Jackson confronts Rose about her growing outlaw gang
36:55 - Bitter Creek ambushes Jackson's posse during a tense canyon standoff
49:12 - Rose discovers hidden evidence exposing the real killers of Belle Starr
1:01:29 - Jackson and Bitter Creek clash in a brutal saloon showdown over conflicting loyalties
1:08:45 - Rose confronts the corrupt sheriff whose badge matches her mother's death-grip clue
1:14:31 - Jackson risks his badge to protect Rose during the explosive final reckoning at Starr's Hideout
